ygData.subject: Re: List activity? Let get it going.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just wondering... what do you think +10 charisma will get you? I had Spirit of the Snake when I was a Shaman, giving me +20 Mana and even more, yet it made
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 17 May 1999 12:38:30 -0700, you wrote:

>From: "K" <kayntwhyle@...>
>
>+ 10 CHA is -far- from a waste of time. Can you tell us how to get this
>item?

Just wondering... what do you think +10 charisma will get you? I had
Spirit of the Snake when I was a Shaman, giving me +20 Mana and even
more, yet it made almost NO difference in buying stuff (maybe +5%
maximum). +10 does seem like a big waste of time to me, but perhaps
I'm missing something.
--------------------------------------------------
Ben Pocock
